title: Why do so many rich entertainers become broke? - Quora

response.answer_text: Probably because they came from rather financially poor backgrounds and they were simply overwhelmed at having so much cash at their disposal. Sometimes their relatively young ages work against them too, in which they haven’t yet developed any kind of financial skills in order keep solvent. Plus they are usually surrounded by moochers and parasites who pass themselves off as “friends” that these entertainers can’t simply resist spending money on because they’re lonely and they think friendship can be purchased like a case of beer.
